lines: You walk into your bedroom about to go to sleep. The dark shapes stare at you from every corner of the room. Headlights cast eerie shadows on the walls. You have heard that the TICKLE BUGS sneak into little girls' rooms and hide
under the bed to GET their victims during the night.

You search under the bed and see the shadows of toys and socks left under the bed. A stuffed animal's glassy eyes shine through the darkness. Everything is quiet. What was that? Only a noise from downstairs. The TICKLE BUGS don't
seem to be here...not tonight, anyway.

Hiding under the covers, all sounds are magnified. Your breathing sounds like the waves at the ocean. Your heart is pounding fast. You imagine that A GIANT TICKLE BUG is sitting up on your bed just waiting for you to look up so that
they can TICKLE YOUR FEET OFF!!!

You stay under the covers and accept the fact that this might be your last night on earth. The TICKLE BUGS will tickle you to death right after you close your eyes, but you are tired and feel yourself sinking into sleep. In your
dreams tonight you will meet the TICKLE BUGS and stomp on them before they can get you!

You bring the covers away from your head and find a large, dark, ugly figure staring into your eyes. EEEEeeK!!! No...wait a minute...it's only Dad. You begin to tell him about the TICKLE BUGS, but you know he probably wouldn't
You are too frightened to go to sleep.
If you are so brave, why look? Would you STILL be so brave if I told you that the TICKLE BUGS have been seen outside your window tonight?
Even if I told you that they wait for little girls to fall asleep and crawl IN BETWEEN THEIR TOES (HOW GROSS!!)
EVEN IF I TOLD YOU THEY ARE CRAWLING AROUND UNDER YOUR BED AT THIS VERY MOMENT??!!
Then you are too brave to be scared.
Ha! Scared you anyway, didn't I?
You get extra points for honesty.
If you're so BRAVE, then why did you hide under the covers?
Do you really think you are BRAVE enough to go to sleep?

Better safe than sorry, I guess. It's kind of hard to go to sleep thinking that you might be visited by the TICKLE BUGS. Can you sleep knowing that the TICKLE BUGS are planning a surprise attack tonight?
You must be very tired, then. Good night!
You want to hide under the covers. Instead...
You are so tired that you don't have the energy to be afraid of the TICKLE BUGS, do you? You quickly sleep and dream that they are chasing you around the house.
#VACUUM THEM UP IN THE CARPET SWEEPER (IN YOUR DREAM)
All of a sudden, the walls have no outlets to plug in the carpet sweeper. They tickle you until you get a bad stomach ache!
They follow you into the basement. You fly up the stairs and lock the door so that they can't get you tonight.
You have no imagination. Aren't you the least bit afraid of things that go bump in the night?
Good. Then look under the bed.
